correction_response: This tweet is misinformed. The president has been donating his salary to different government initiatives each quarter, as confirmed by multiple sources. While it's true that he hasn't donated his entire yearly salary to one specific cause, he has distributed it among various departments and initiatives. For instance, his first quarter salary in 2017 was donated to the National Park Service, and in 2018, it was given to the Department of Veterans Affairs, among others. You can find more details here: https://www.factcheck.org/2018/08/false-stories-revive-claim-about-trump-salary-donation/ and here: https://factcheck.afp.com/doc.afp.com.33682XG.
